snippet.title: Apocalypse - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Fight for your survival or die trying! Ashes of Creation Apocalypse is the standalone prequel to the upcoming epic MMORPG Ashes of Creation. It is both a testing ground for new systems and content in Ashes of Creation, as well as a unique multi-mode battle arena game where magic, steel, and chaos reign supreme. Starting this Tuesday, players will be able to play our action-packed Battle Royale mode, and fight to be the last one standing! Additional game modes like Horde and Castle Sieges will be available in future updates. Apocalypse is a high fantasy, free-to-play experience where no two battles are ever the same.

Play now for free by registering at http://www.AshesofCreation.com

Follow us on
http://www.facebook.com/AoCApocalypse
http://www.Twitter.com/AoCApocalypse
http://www.Twitch.TV/AoCApocalypse

Join the discussion by connecting to our official Discord
http://www.Discord.gg/AshesofCreation

Visit our store at https://www.ashesofcreation.com/shop/
